original: title, The Shadow of Kalbharov. In the heart of Kashi, a sacred temple-hidden dark secret.
translated: title, The Shadow of Kalbharov. In the heart of Kashi, a sacred temple-hidden dark secret.

original: Legend spoke of a warrior priest named Rudra. Chosen by Lord Kalbharo himself to protect
translated: Legend spoke of a warrior priest named Rudra. Chosen by Lord Kalbharo himself to protect

original: the city from evil forces. One Stomy Knight, As the sky cracked with thunder. A rogue cult
translated: the city from evil forces. One Stomy Knight, As the sky cracked with thunder. A rogue cult

original: called Tamasi tried to unleash a forbidden weapon buried beneath the temple. The Trinitra,
translated: called Tamasi tried to unleash a forbidden weapon buried beneath the temple. The Trinitra,

original: an ancient relic said to destroy time itself. Rudra, wielding a trident blessed by the gods,
translated: an ancient relic said to destroy time itself. Rudra, wielding a trident blessed by the gods,

original: emerged from the shadows, with blazing speed and divine rage. He battled masked warriors
translated: emerged from the shadows, with blazing speed and divine rage. He battled masked warriors

original: through the rain-soaked hallies of the old city. As the cult reached the inner sanctum,
translated: through the rain-soaked hallies of the old city. As the cult reached the inner sanctum,

original: Rudra chanted mantras that summoned a fiery aura. He fought the cult leader, who had merged

original: with dark energy. In a spectacular clash of light and shadow. In the end, Rudra hurled his

original: trident into the heart of darkness. Sealing the weapon forever, exhausted but victorious,
translated: trident into the heart of darkness. Sealing the weapon forever, exhausted but victorious,

original: he vanished before dawn. His oath fulfilled, since that day, the people say, when darkness rises
